articles.author: Mike Stubbs
articles.title: New ‘Valorant’ Agent Clove Can Come Back From The Dead - Forbes
articles.description: New Valorant agent Clove has been revealed and they can come back from the dead, as well as drop smokes and become a tank with their unique abilities.
articles.content:
Clove is the new Valorant agent and they have some interesting abilities. 
Credit: Riot Games
At the Valorant Masters Madrid tournament, Riot Games unveiled Clove, the new Valorant agent who has th… [+2736 chars]

articles.title: Triple lock for pensions to be in Tory manifesto - Jeremy Hunt says - BBC.com
articles.description: Chancellor Jeremy Hunt says he will pay for the "expensive" pledge through economic growth.

articles.title: Passenger reported overboard from Southampton cruise ship - BBC.com
articles.description: The man was reported missing from the MSC Euribia which left Southampton on 15 March.
